评论详情: I have been wearing this set non stop this summer! I am 9 months pregnant and the large fits me well. I have washed this a few times and the material is still holding up nicely- no shrinkage or peeling! This set makes me feel like I’m still well put together but also I’m comfortable and not thinking too much about what to wear. I love it and will buy more colors for post partum lounging!
My daughter is the recipient of this article of clothing, and she loves it. She says it is soft, comfortable, and flattering. So I recommend it.

Originally bought this in hopes that I could wear it when I go out to run errands but it’s so incredibly see through that I can’t wear it out. It makes a nice outfit to lounge around the house in, but not made for going out in public (for me anyway) unfortunately.
Good quality the fit was exact lightweight and comfortable and breathable. Value is ok. Only thing I’d knock it on

I recently received a pair of these and the fit and soft texture were wonderful. I tried them on and wore them for the entire day at home!! The next day I ordered a second pair. No tugging. Pinching. They honestly felt like wearing nothing at all.
I adore this set! It is super soft, comfortable and true to size. Every person that has seen me wear it, has asked where I got it and given lots of compliments. Highly recommend!
Super thin material and itchy. The stock photo makes it look thicker and much softer. 10/10 do not recommend.
These have to be in your closet!!!! So comfy and cute. Dress up or down!!!
Bought these for my elderly mother, she LOVES them. She says they are so comfortable and tells me I should by some for myself :P

I was looking for a matching biker short/oversized top set that was a good dupe for some $100+ sets that are trendy right now. This is perfect. Super comfy and stretchy. I work from home and mostly hang at home with my husband and kids and this is such a great lounge set for that. I'm typically a size 8 and ordered a Large bc I wanted an oversized fit, even though Amazon recommended a Med. Fits exactly as I'd hoped it would! Will definitely be buying another color or 2.

Love this set! I enjoyed it so much, I ended up getting two other colors and convinced my mom to get two sets as well! I got these to have something comfy to wear after having my baby. They fit wonderfully and the shirt is oversized. It did seem to shrink a bit after washing but that wasn’t an issue to me. The only “issue” I have with this particular set was the color was a bit darker than the photos depict which isn’t a huge deal but I would have loved something a little lighter. Other than that, this was a great purchase!
Nicely made. Looks good. Can really even wear as a short set to go out. Highly recommend

These are super comfortable, but the color is off. These also don’t wrinkle which is super nice. The fabric is stretchy but not restrictive. From the photos I thought the blue would be more of a powder blue and the khaki would be lighter, but the blue is more dusty and khaki just looks darker. I am 5’2” and about 150 lbs and ordered a large. I could have gone with a medium. I bought these because I’m really into biker shorts and big tees (2 months postpartum) and thought I could wear these out. IMO they look too much like pajamas on me to pull it off. Could be that the shirt is too big on me. In any case, these are great for lounging around the house!
Outfit is just ok. Material not the greatest.
This set is so comfortable!! Love it

Material is very soft and stretchy. The bottoms fit like a glove, but breathable material makes it comfy not too tight and the top has a more baggy look but not oversized. I wish it wasn’t see through that’s my only complaint. 4 stars! True to size

Love the feel of these pj's. Very comfy, bought my regular size but wish I had bought a size up as I like my pj's to be a bit baggy. Only complaint is I wish the top was longer by 6 inches. I'm tall and like my tops long. Other than that everything is fine. Color is as pictured,  I ordered the gray, very nice material. 👌

These look and feel nothing like pajamas I purchased 3 sets and wore  them around the house all summer long as comfy clothes. I even wore them to the store! The price point was amazing and the quality of these definitely were a bargain. I probably would’ve purchased other colors but 2 sets is plenty. I already packed them away for next summer and they still look brand new! Definitely worth purchasing again.

This is my third set of these pajamas/lounge wear. They are soft and comfortable to sleep in. They have been washed multiple times and look brand new. I purchased a set for my Mom for Mothers day and she loves them. She even said she's ran to the store in them. That surprised me :) Would make great inexpensive Christmas gifts!

Great Outfit to lounge around I bought one set loved it so much I ordered more my only complaint is that the black set shorts are see through will be only using the shirt . Also if you want a lose fit size up, overall very comfy
Comfy material for on the go as well as lounging around.

Relaxed fit, soft and not bunchy. Love the rose color! Love the longer sleeve and shorts length. Perfect! Bravo! Bought a 2nd set.

This short set is very comfortable and easy to wear. Versatile enough to wear it out or at home. Lightweight and wrinkle resistant, it is quality knit that doesn't shrink. The dark gray goes with everything. I also have it in tan. Fits true to size and looks great!

Thin but not see-through, soft and very comfortable. True to size, I’m 16/18 2xl and got 2xl. Color is as pictured. Considering buying more colors!

I really like these sets!  I bought two: one in green and the other in tan.  The sets fit true to size and the material is soft and stretchy.  It’s great that they can be worn as PJs and out of the house!  Very happy with my purchase!

评论概述: Laundered nicely, very soft, color not quite as expected
评论详情: The NORACORA Pajamas 2-piece set is very comfortable. I ordered a big size because I like a lot of room in my nightclothes. The shirt drapes nicely, and the material is soft and VERY stretchy. The fabric is lightweight. The shorts are fitted as pictured in the description — not roomy — so be mindful of that if you like looser bottoms. I ordered the dark grey, but it appears to be a brownish color or at least have a brownish hue to it. I think the pj's are overpriced at the current price point of $27.99 (USD).

I bought this set to wear while recovering from foot surgery. It’s super comfortable breathable. Wore it to the hospital and also to sleep. Doesn’t look like pajamas so this could definitely be worn out to run errands or even whatever. The only thing is the waist band felt a little tight but it was still super comfortable. The fabric weight is perfect. I haven’t washed it yet so I can’t speak about that. Definitely getting it in at least one other color. I think this will be my go to outfit as I recover from my surgery. Would absolutely recommend

I like this outfit because it’s lightweight and very comfy. I love the length of the sleeves and shorts. The ribbed material adds something extra to the outfit. I ordered a size up and the top is oversized, but the shorts fit good.
Looked better in the picture than it did in person, but it also didn't look more than general nice loungewear...not too stylish. Super comfortable and that the main thing.

This set is an all right lounge set for either sleeping or those days when you know you won't be leaving the house. The top is perfectly baggy and comfortable. The bottoms are what I am not in love with. I find that the bottoms are a little snug in the waist band and it cuts into my in an unflattering way. Fortunately, the shirt is big and baggy enough that you can't easily spot my muffin top. I do love the grayish green color, though!

this lounge set was a hit! fits my thighs and butt perfectly! the top is long enough to cover my front and butt. it doesnt stretch out and has withheld many times through the washer. i love this set so much i want to order in more colors!

Ordered this to use as a lounge set/pjs for the home and they are really nice! Super comfy and lightweight/breathable fabric. Washes very well. Truly an oversized fit, but the shorts are true to size. Love the shade!
Comfy set, accurate sizing which is nice!
I love this set! Fits great and I always find myself reaching for it
